CustomField.description: (Optional) A technical JSON Schema definition describing the expected structure for the 'Action Implementation Configuration' JSON field on the 'Agent Capability Binding' record. Used when this reusable action needs specific backend configuration that varies per agent binding.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: (Optional) JSON Schema defining the required structure for the 'Action Implementation Config (JSON)' field on the Agent Capability Binding record. Use this ONLY when a reusable action requires specific backend settings (not passed by the LLM) that might differ per agent. Example: Define a default email template ID here that could be customized per binding. Format as valid JSON Schema. Leave blank if this action requires no binding-specific backend configuration settings.
CustomField.label: Binding Config Schema (JSON Schema)
